DOC.HEAD: Text of Noriega's Radio Statement
With PM-Panama, Bjt
DOC.TEXT: Here is the text of a statement that Gen. Manuel Antonio Noriega made Wednesday night on a government-run radio station. The communique was translated by The Associated Press. This is Gen. Manuel Antonio Noriega speaking to the Panamanian people. We're in trench warfare now, and we will maintain the resistance. Congratulations to the Dignity Battalions. Congratulations to my companions in arms and to the Defense Forces, and congratulations to the Panamanian people. We must resist and advance. Our slogan: We ask the world for help, with men, dignity, and strength. We ask the world for this help today, for a Panama that needs it. Our slogan is to win or die, not one step back, and onward in the step of conquerors.
